message.body:
******* STOP USING file share sites that keep removing links! Start using IPFS where you host your own files and they can never be taken down!! Once they get distributed on the network they are live FOREVER. On top of that the files upload super fast!! Check out these 3 links 

1: easy download and install client https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmSTA5pGyjb4hDS3zLeWqFYs6XseF8x6h8a5XkmubKb6ry

2. like 65 pic only took 5 seconds to upload: https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmVydH3y6CXEDJuq5gYNYq1jPX8QWUzQTCzcnqDTzy2Eue

depending on browser and connection links can take a little to load, most of the time its instantly

>>c4b52921cb
thank you! did you grab the clients i linked?? start sharing if you did!!

>>443fd7282d
Wow this is a good idea 65 pic in only 5 seconds that amazing
